last_episode_to_air.name: Fire and the Sky
last_episode_to_air.overview: An officer defends himself from a man with an unusual weapon; airline passengers protect their plane from a potential threat, and the Easter Bunny defends a woman.

name: Crimes Gone Viral
overview: Gripping clips of kidnappings, break-ins, car chases, violent road rage incidents and other crimes rack up millions of views. But crimes gone viral goes beyond the jaw-dropping footage to tell the full story. Viral video of good samaritans who intervene to stop crimes, brave victims who fight back against their attackers, clever prison escapes and a shark heist.

episodes.name: Do No Harm
episodes.overview: A man is driving home when he sees a woman been dragged down the street against her will. Another man is visiting his girlfriend at work on Valentine's Day when a robber leaps onto the counter. Both men take heroic action, ensuring that no harm is done.

episodes.name: Run With It
episodes.overview: At an aquarium, thieves snatch a shark from an open tank and make a break for it, with employees hot on their heels. Next, two inmates make a creative escape by hiding in garbage cans. They're all on the run, and the hunt is on to find them.

episodes.name: Snatched
episodes.overview: A young woman walks home after a family gathering. Another young woman goes out to get cold medicine. Then, with no warning danger strikes and both women are kidnapped.

episodes.name: Bold Moves
episodes.overview: A gunfight erupts when a mother and daughter bravely defend their business from an armed robber. Later, a man who tries to rob a marital arts instructor quickly realizes he messed with the wrong person.

episodes.name: Grab and Go
episodes.overview: A robber attempts to hold up four young men at gunpoint, but he's in for a surprise when his victims fight back. And then, a man with a shotgun storms into a garage, but is outmatched by an employee who won't back down.

episodes.name: Surprise Attack
episodes.overview: An afternoon motorcycle ride turns into a violent road rage incident when a couple is attacked by an angry driver. Then an armed robber assaults a young woman working alone, but she bravely fights back and fends off her assailant.

episodes.name: Caught in the Act
episodes.overview: A strange man violently attempts to kidnaps a woman's children, but a 16-year-old wrestler saves the day. Then a frightening cab robbery takes place in broad daylight until someone unexpected comes to the rescue.

episodes.name: Don't Mess With My Kid
episodes.overview: Two armed thieves approach a young woman to steal her car, but they get a shock when she fights back. Later, the father of a 15-year-old girl sets up a family sting to apprehend the 33-year-old man trying to seduce her.

episodes.name: No Fear
episodes.overview: A man with a large gun enters a bar late at night and orders everyone to get on the floor, but one patron refuses to comply. Then a pair of brazen shoplifters lead police on a dangerous high-speed chase.

episodes.name: Stranger Danger
episodes.overview: A man steals a car with two young siblings inside, causing a panic. As they try to escape, the kidnapper grabs the girl's hoodie, but her brother bravely fights back. Then a 12-year-old stands up to the woman trying to kidnap her baby brother.

episodes.name: Watch Dogs
episodes.overview: After getting an alert on his computer, a man races home to confront two men burglarizing his home. Later, a defenseless woman and her child are terrorized by a strange man who enters their home until their 122-pound Great Dane springs into action.

episodes.name: Who Let the Dogs Out?
episodes.overview: It looks like a Hollywood action film as a crazed female driver speeds through neighborhoods in an RV, with two dogs sitting on her lap. Later, a woman tosses a bag of newborn dogs into a dumpster, outraging an entire community.

episodes.name: No, You Don't!
episodes.overview: In Florida, a woman shopping for bathing suits bravely chases after a man who harassers her and learns he's a predator who has been preying on women for years. Later, two good samaritans intervene after an elderly couple is robbed.

episodes.name: Out of Control
episodes.overview: A drunk passenger grabs the wheel from a rideshare driver's hands, creating a potentially deadly scene on a highway. And then, a group of friends on a fishing excursion find themselves in terrifying peril when a speeding boat plows right into them.

episodes.name: Child's Nightmare
episodes.overview: A car with screaming children hanging out of its windows heads straight into the ocean, and shocked bystanders spring into action. Then in a terrifying scene, two children sleep in their home, unaware that armed burglars are right next to them.

episodes.name: Get Out
episodes.overview: A man brazenly burglarizes a house while the homeowners watch helplessly on a streaming security camera. Then, a determined woman inexplicably fires a gun into a house and then returns to toss in a flaming torch.

episodes.name: Knock, Knock, Who's There?
episodes.overview: In California, a doorbell camera captures a disoriented woman trying to break into a home as the terrified homeowner prepares to protect herself. Also, in Texas, a panicked woman with restraints on her arms rings a doorbell in the middle of the night.

episodes.name: Don't Mess With Me
episodes.overview: A mother is inside a gas station when a man steals her car, with her 13-year-old and 6-month old daughters inside. A waitress is sexually assaulted, but she takes matters into her own hands and attacks her assaulter.

episodes.name: Men Gone Wild
episodes.overview: A man with a shotgun bursts into a home late one night, and the resident is forced to defend himself and protect his fiancee. Then, a man goes on a violent rampage in a diner, and two women find themselves in a fight for survival.

episodes.name: Drunk Driving Terror
episodes.overview: A drunk driver speeds the wrong way down a highway, and police suddenly find themselves in a seriously dangerous situation. Then, a car swerves wildly across the road, and a family intervenes to prevent tragedy.

episodes.name: Danger on the Street
episodes.overview: It's a woman's worst nightmare -- a stranger followers her as she walks home. Terrified, she turns on her cell phone to record him as she tries to get away. And then, a vicious, unprovoked attack on a child dancing in the street prompts outrage.

episodes.name: Customers Gone Wild
episodes.overview: They are shocking examples of anger out of control. A rideshare customer aggressively attacks her own driver and then, another agitated patron gets violent at a fast-food restaurant, putting other people's lives in danger.

episodes.name: Dangerous Strangers
episodes.overview: The true stories of people who have been attacked by random strangers, with camera footage from the scene and testimony from eyewitnesses.

episodes.name: Child Snatchers
episodes.overview: Scenes of terror in broad daylight leave two mothers horrified. A stranger tries to snatch a child from a stroller. Then, another man attempts to take a child right out of her chair at a restaurant, but good Samaritans rush in to help.

episodes.name: Car Attacks
episodes.overview: A woman responsible for a hit and run is so desperate to evade police, she becomes dangerously reckless and out of control. And then, when a group of cyclists attack a man driving with his mother, things get downright terrifying.

episodes.name: Vicious Abductions
episodes.overview: Two strangers attempt to steal a stunned woman's beloved dog while on a walk. They brutally attack as she tries to fight them off. Next, a man finds himself in a frightening battle for his life after a friend betrays him.

episodes.name: Clueless Robbers
episodes.overview: Thieves think they're smart but get foiled by their clueless actions. A band of robbers holding up a gas station forgets that the clerk has control of the doors. Another thief doesn't realize that the customer behind him is a policeman.

episodes.name: We See You
episodes.overview: A woman fed up with the chaos caused by a couple known as the 'neighbors from hell' begins videotaping them, and a volatile explosion erupts. Later, an oblivious couple is too busy making out at a bar to realize an armed robbery is underway.

episodes.name: Criminals Gone Wild
episodes.overview: An alleged shoplifter gets wildly out of control when she is confronted by one of the store's employees. Then, it's a terrifying scene caught on camera on a highway as a reckless driver crashes into signs and cars.

episodes.name: Catch That Crook
episodes.overview: A high-speed police chase of a suspected killer has a city on edge. But a brave bystander intervenes, risking his own life to end the dangerous pursuit. And then, a daring cowboy on horseback uses a wild, unexpected maneuver to stop a bike thief.

episodes.name: Reckless at the Wheel
episodes.overview: Like a scene from a movie, police chase a thief in a stolen RV through streets and residential areas. Later, another dangerous high-speed chase has a shocking twist when police realize the driver has her baby in the back seat.

episodes.name: Oh No, You Don't!
episodes.overview: A family fights to defend each other, and their store, when they are held up. Then, police scramble to contain a pair of bold young car thieves who seem to think they are invincible.

episodes.name: Horror In The Street
episodes.overview: A woman enjoying a holiday celebration is the victim of a shocking hit-and-run caught on camera; when a man steals a grandmother's purse right off a restaurant table, she jumps into action, chasing him into the parking lot.

episodes.name: Brazen Bandits
episodes.overview: Thieves forget that most businesses keep security cameras rolling. In Texas, a band of robbers is dubbed "the inchworm bandits" when cameras catch them crawling across floors. In New York, a dognapper looks straight into the lens.

episodes.name: I'll Stop Him
episodes.overview: A man risks his own life to record a crime in progress and follow the criminals until police arrive; a woman turns her own boyfriend into police when she realizes an innocent man has been charged with a crime he didn't commit.

episodes.name: Terrified For Their Lives
episodes.overview: Cameras catch two terrifying invasions. A violent robbery puts a store clerk's life in danger and police on edge. And then, a young woman is stalked in her own home by a creepy intruder, and there's a frightening confrontation.

episodes.name: Fiery Attacks
episodes.overview: It's a terrifying scene at a gas station when a man with a lighter douses everything with gasoline, threatening to ignite a potentially deadly inferno. And then, an employee bravely fights back when armed robbers hold him up.

episodes.name: Where is He Hiding?
episodes.overview: A traffic stop threatens to become deadly for a police officer when a mom goes to extreme lengths to protect her son. Later, a couple's quiet night at home turns into terror.

episodes.name: Explosive Break-Ins
episodes.overview: Bold thieves invade a couple's home three times in one week. The frightened couple don't know who is targeting them or if the thieves will return. Later, it's a recipe for disaster when a man lights up what appears to be a bomb at a gas station.

episodes.name: Surprise Attacks
episodes.overview: It is road rage out of control when a man gets so angry at a couple who accidentally cut him off that he follows and threatens them. Next, a friendly encounter at a gas station takes a terrifying turn.

episodes.name: Risky Moves
episodes.overview: A defiant victim refuses to give up even when a thief runs him over; an unnamed security guard saves the day when a gunman storms in; brave homeowners tackle flames after an unprovoked car arson; a crossing guard risks her own life to save a child.

episodes.name: No Escape
episodes.overview: A quick-thinking employee outsmarts armed thieves; a mother jumps into action when her son gets snatched off the street; someone attacks a woman in her own driveway; a burglar literally gets stuck, with comedic results.

episodes.name: Nowhere To Run
episodes.overview: Someone attacks a pregnant woman on a motorway. A wild chase ensues after a woman steals a police cruiser, two off-duty officers have to abandon their date night to jump into action and a convenience store theft comes to a shocking end.

episodes.name: Bold Moves
episodes.overview: A woman under attack rings a stranger's doorbell for help. A brave 10-year-old narrowly escapes kidnappers, a security guard confronts an armed mob of smash-and-grab thieves, and a heroic young woman risks her life to stand up to a bully.

episodes.name: Unwanted Intruders
episodes.overview: Armed intruders terrorize a group of teens as their horrified parents watch on a surveillance camera. Fake government workers steal from unsuspecting residents, and two would-be thieves are stopped in their tracks.

episodes.name: Caught by Surprise
episodes.overview: Routine trips to the store turn terrifying when criminals watch. A young girl is brutally assaulted as she walks down the street, a wild shootout breaks out right in the middle of busy traffic, and fed-up employees thwart a persistent thief.

episodes.name: Danger at the Door
episodes.overview: A frightening stranger uses a doorbell camera to threaten a woman; a mom and her toddler are held at gunpoint in their lobby; a man experiences a violent assault as he heads out with his family; a spring break gathering rages wildly out of control.

episodes.name: Out of Control
episodes.overview: Crooks make jaw-dropping moves in these wild crimes caught on camera.

episodes.name: Who's Watching You
episodes.overview: Calculating thieves target a family making a special jewelry purchase; gas stations turn into danger zones when criminals attack innocent drivers at the pump; tire-slashing crooks cause havoc; a remarkably calm clerk stands up to an armed robber.

episodes.name: Unexpected
episodes.overview: Good Samaritans rescue a police officer under attack, bystanders help a young victim of human trafficking, and when criminals try to escape, surprise heroes step in to save the day.

episodes.name: Fighting Back
episodes.overview: A young mother faces a home invasion; a band of thieves ransacks a community-minded business; a bold grandmother turns the tables on would-be scammers; a 5-year-old fights to protect his mom.

episodes.name: Fearless Criminals
episodes.overview: Brazen thieves steal catalytic converters right out of peoples driveways, a woman wielding an ax puts a babys life in danger, a stalker kidnaps a woman from her job, and cars become weapons in violent smash-and-grab robberies.

episodes.name: Mama Bears Don't Play
episodes.overview: A good Samaritan defends a stranger, an elderly woman does the unexpected, a mail carrier fights for his life, and a frightening mom is caught on camera in a precarious situation.

episodes.name: Hazards on the Clock
episodes.overview: Criminals target fast-food restaurants; a drive-through employee takes things too far; a disgruntled customer tries to burn down a bodega; a judge and a defendant face off.

episodes.name: Crowd Control
episodes.overview: Onlookers witness the assault of a riverboat captain on a dock and rush to help. A man flees from police using unconventional methods. A store clerk traps a burglar in her store. A bouncer defends a strip club from a gunman.

episodes.name: Break Downs and Blow Ups
episodes.overview: A woman has a meltdown in a local bank; a driver causes extreme property damage; a police showdown comes to an explosive end; a detained woman gets the upper hand on the police.

episodes.name: Back to Jail
episodes.overview: A suspected drunk driver gives police a good laugh; a Jiu-Jitsu Master defends a convenience store; multiple prisoners attempt to reclaim their freedom; a convicted murderer leads police on a wild goose chase.

episodes.name: Public Panic
episodes.overview: A group of customers fight in a small shop; a tired police officer gets a helping hand from a civilian; an angry customer takes her frustrations out on a fast-food restaurant; an active shooter interrupts a youth baseball game.

episodes.name: Bad Intentions
episodes.overview: A hero leaps into action to save a struggling police officer; police catch a man snooping on his neighbors; a woman stumbles upon an unexpected guest in her child's bed; an unhinged woman opens fire inside a police station.

episodes.name: Catching Crooks
episodes.overview: A man flees his ax-wielding renter; porch pirates are caught on camera, ruining people's days; a group of teens hunts for a couple of package thieves; police receive assistance from an unlikely animal.

episodes.name: Karma Is Viral
episodes.overview: Looters wreak havoc in Philadelphia; a stubborn woman turns a ticket into a felony; a suspect on the run picks a rather stinky hideout, and a heroic civilian gives police a helping hand.

episodes.name: Drunk, Pizza, Bandits
episodes.overview: A father defends his family from a group of aggressors; a pizza delivery guy becomes an unlikely hero; an armed elderly man reaches his breaking point; an inebriated Amish man has an unfortunate run-in with police.

episodes.name: Bad Criminals
episodes.overview: A father and son exchange gunfire; a group of clumsy criminals proves that crime is not easy; a terrified woman fights off a kidnapper, and a man defends his home from thieves.
